GSD.description:
tracing: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context on RT kernel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 43bfc4dccc416c964b53cbdc430e814f8b6f770b. For more details please see the references link.
